message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I see you're serious. How about we split the difference and settle at $13,250?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
